mapper.sql: id, username, password, is_deleted, create_time, modified_time
mapper.select: select count(*) from admin where id=#{id}
mapper.insert:
insert into admin
id,
username,
password,
is_deleted,
create_time,
modified_time,

SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
mapper.update:
update admin
username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
is_deleted = #{isDeleted,jdbcType=TINYINT},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
modified_time = #{modifiedTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update admin set username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_deleted = #{isDeleted,jdbcType=TINYINT}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, modified_time = #{modifiedTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
